text: you can use it using token or oauth

Does anyone know if there is any news on a newer version of the merge api?
We are currently facing a Problem in a data syncing connector project where we need to merge contacts via the API but the properties values that are merged by "most recently changed" priority.
I can think of a few workarounds, but would love to know if there is any newer API version coming up?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/merge-contacts>
<@UDHT6N5SM> Its non auth API, So private app is not required
Where does the hub ID go?
<@U04R20MJQJ1> I am trying to create a site search functionality within some pages, So id based search would not useful for me
Andrey, Its based on Portal ID
Is the portal ID added to the end of the url?
```<https://api.hubapi.com/contentsearch/v2/search?portalId={{portal_id}}&term=How&type=BLOG_POST>```
Thanks, I’ll give that a shot. I’m on mobile but I think that didn’t work for public hubdb queries earlier

I linked the wrong API:
*/crm/v3/objects/contacts/merge is the latest (V3) but does the same -> merge the more recent value for each property. I would love to see an option where we can determine which properties have priority in which contact.*

Hey all! Im trying to pull data from a HubDB table,

This is my CURL command just to test it out

curl --request GET \
  --url ‘<https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/hubdb/tables/1234566788/rows?&sort=added_by_sponsor_id__eq%3D%68>’ \
  --header ‘authorization: Bearer ABCDEFG1234567’
If I run it without the filter it brings back all the rows. But if I try to run it with the filter, the same thing happens. There is no filtering
Anybody with ideas of what is going wrong? The column is set up as a number
TIA
have you tried to run this on the document page?
I mean where you can addd parameters and test the call?
OK, Ive tried that and the same thing. Its not filtering
Does this bit look correct to you?
sort=added_by_sponsor_id__eq%3D%68’
Maybe anyone here is familiar with "Make" and can help me understand why I keep on getting this error from HubSpot?

Hello! Was recommended by the technical support to get in touch here :pray:

I need help to integrate my CRM Membrain into HubSpot. The integration guide is outdated. It says that I shall create an API Key - which I have learned doesn't exist anymore, and that I instead should create a Private Key (which I have tried but failed with and have no idea how to proceed :stuck_out_tongue: ) Would love to get your support. Thank you!

Hey,

yes - API Keys are no longer used with the HubSpot API.

If you are planning to only integrate with a single portal, the private app route can be valid. You have to ensure, that you are accepting the right scopes for the planed requests to HubSpots API Endpoints.

If the integration is supposed to be used by multiple portals, you would instead create a HubSpot developer account and create a public app. The difference between public app and private app is the amount of work needed for authentication as public apps require you to implement the HubSpot Authorization Flow with OAuth2.

I guess I need a bit more info to be of service - I am a freelance Dev / Solution Architect that works with HubSpot Integrations every day.
Are you just trying to sync data?
Because you might consider using this HubSpot build sync tool: <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/24148367/marketplace/apps/sales/sales-enablement/membrain-data-sync>
Yeah definitely a good thought but might get pretty complex (what if you want to second most recent property value from contact A to be the primary value even though contact B is the primary contact)
What I want is to give them priority for all fields. So if I merge Contact A into B I want all fields of Contact B to remain, but get the association of Contact A on Contact B.
The easiest solution I can see for that is to override all Properties of Contact A with the Properties of B before I merge them.
Oh yeah that would be interesting, just breaking out the associations and properties as separately definable primary and secondary
Yeah that would be easiest
The associations first route will be uber complex (especially with things like notes, emails, calls etc)
(Which I should ask, are you looking to also merge engagements?)
The 20 second timeout will get you,
even with the retry hack that will only get you a 7 day window
DND templates?

In this case is actually newsletter engagements on Contacts that need to be merged with a duplicate contact that was created by another system. We already went through the system to flag them as "primary/secondary" but only to realize that we cannot control the property values. But before we reassociate all objects on the secondary ones, I was looking for easier options or a newer API ^^
Yes
There is this landing page which is not returning me content over the API and i am not able to figure out why

Hi team, I'm trying to query the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files|files API> but I'm getting the following error, see print.
Using: *`/files/v3/files/import-from-url/async`*

When I add:
`from HubSpot.files.files import ImportFromUrlInput, ApiException`
then I get the following error:
```---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
Cell In[16], line 10
      8 import_from_url_input = ImportFromUrlInput(access="PRIVATE", name="767fd5d8-e3f3-4d65-a02d-2eaee175b3cf", url="", folder_id="115750172262", duplicate_validation_strategy="REJECT", duplicate_validation_scope="EXACT_FOLDER", overwrite=False)
      9 try:
---> 10     api_response = client.files.files_api.import_from_url(import_from_url_input=import_from_url_input)
     11     pprint(api_response)
     12 except ApiException as e:

AttributeError: 'Discovery' object has no attribute 'files_api'```
I don't understand why I cannot get the files_api..
I'm using python and I'm in the virtual environment.
Do we have some permissions control for API

Hey everyone! Hope you are doing great. :deploy_parrot: Did know in each channel I should post this question but...
I am developing a CRM Card without BETA. But the app to create the CRM Card is just a integration beetween HubSpot and another plataform.  After authentication in this other plataform, they returns me an access token to make the requests. Since my app doesn't have a database, I was wondering if I can store this access token in HubSpot related to the user who install the app. Can I do that? If not, do you have any suggestion to store the access token?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C011F74BKQW/p1684252170096059>

I figured it out....
`api_response = client.files.files.files_api.import_from_url(import_from_url_input=import_from_url_input)`
adding `.files.`...

Hi everyone, is there any API endpoint(s) to know which Campaign a Form is linked to? Forms can be linked to a HubSpot Campaign during setup and I would like to summarize Form submission/page views by a particular Campaign.
Thank you! Yes I think I'm only trying to sync data, or what would be the alternative? :slightly_smiling_face:
Is it possible to get the soonest available appointment on a HubSpot meeting calendar using the API?
Yeah some things like creating emails or stuff like that but if you're just syncing objects and properties I think you can just use the above tool

Hi, guys! Super new to HubSpot here :slightly_smiling_face:
Could someone please tell me how I could run this API request?
```<https://api.hubapi.com/crm-objects/v1/objects/tickets/1618257335>```

Hi all! Everytime I pull and run a docker image, I get an error of SSL when trying to create my laravel project by using Composer

 `[Composer\Downloader\TransportException]`
  `The "<https://packagist.org/packages.json>" file could not be downloaded: SSL operation failed with code 1. OpenSSL E`
  `rror messages:`
  `error:14090086:SSL routines:SSL3_GET_SERVER_CERTIFICATE:certificate verify failed`
  `Failed to enable crypto`
  `failed to open stream: operation failed`

Does anyone get a similar error?
Ah ok. We don't have any developer inhouse, but I think it sounds like I need a developer to do this integration?
Or how do I find out how the right scopes for the planed requests to HubSpots API Endpoints are?

If you are using the the exisiting integration you don't necessarily need a Developer.

Regarding the scopes: It depends on which HubSpot Entities you are syncing. So for example if you will sync to Contacts, you should activate the read and write for Contacts.
Most likely you will need to have this for Contacts, Companies and Deals.
